content: WASHINGTON Taro Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd and two of its senior officers received grand jury subpoenas last week in connection with a federal antitrust investigation into generic drug pricing  the company disclosed.

title: U.S. Justice Department subpoenas Taro over generic drug pricing
